    interface UserBase
    An abstract User Base
    Author:
    Francesco Franzini

    • Method Detail

      • containsUser

        boolean containsUser(java.lang.String usn)
        Checks if the given username is in the user base
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        Returns:
        true if the username exists

      • getPw

        java.lang.String getPw(java.lang.String usn)
        Gets the given username's corresponding password
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        Returns:
        the password or null if the user is not existing

      • addUser

        boolean addUser(java.lang.String usn,
                java.lang.String pw)
        Adds a user to the User Base
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        pw - password
        Returns:
        true no errors were raised

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(java.lang.String usn)
        Removes a user from the User Base
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        Returns:
        true if no errors were raised

      • getUserScore

        ScoreEntry getUserScore(java.lang.String usn)
        Gets the ScoreEntry corresponding to a given user
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        Returns:
        the ScoreEntry of that user or null if not present

      • alterUserScore

        void alterUserScore(java.lang.String usn,
                    int dTot,
                    int dWins)
        Alters the given username's score values
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        dTot - value to sum to the existing Point Total
        dWins - value to sum to the existing Win Total

      • getLeaderBoard

        java.util.List<ScoreEntry> getLeaderBoard()
        Returns the leaderboard for this User Base
        Returns:
        a List of ScoreEntry
